dcterms:creator: G. Katz
C. W. Barrett
D. L. Dill
K. Julian
M. J. Kochenderfer
dcterms:description: The ACAS benchmark verification task comprises a set of ten properties to be checked on a subset of 45 feedforward ReLU networks, which represent configurations between two aircraft, one being the ownship and the other the intruder.
dcterms:title: Airborne Collision Avoidance System (ACAS)
